# Git & Github

Mostly terminal commands that are helpful for version control

## Add an Upstream Repository

```{bash, eval = FALSE}
git remote add upstream https://github.com/<owner-of-upstream>/<upstream-repo>.git
```

## Configure Your Credentials

```{bash, eval = FALSE}
  git config --global user.email "you@example.com"
  git config --global user.name "Your Name"
```
